column5: One of my favorite foods, happen's to be Baked Beans. When mom was alive she would make this dish for me. Now I have to make my own, and would like to share with you a French Canadian staple. Baked_Beans.doc
Beans you say?  I dont think my wife would let me eat them.....LOL

Almost edzachary like my recipe.  I add three or four diced cloves of garlic, and a little crushed chili.  I also use salt reduced chicken broth rather than water.  I've tried maple syrup instead of the molasses, too.  Serve with fresh bread, cheese and pickles.  A good crisp ale rounds out the menu.
Sounds good to me,but I have grown fond of PHO on cold days like today.
Thanks for the Baked Bean recipe Clampet I'll give er a whirl!   misfish got any good PHO recipes?   I LOVE PHO!  Gerritt.
Damm douG your makin me hungry!!  Rob C
Hey Clampet...  That sound so easy even I can do it. LOL Sounds goooood too!!  I will definately give it a go!! Just have to decide what day. Soon I hope!!   Thanks!!  dsn

Thx for posting Clampet. I have added it to my word file recipes. Prolly give it a go next week. Baked beans are one of my fav's and I have tried a few slow cooker recipes...but I have not found one I really like yet. Here's hoping !!!
Beano, When you use a couple tablets, there'll BEANO gas!  Available in most discount stores, including Walmart. PS,  They work.
Now that you share the same  icefishing hut with the wife Cliff I wouldn't want to share it with  you after you have consumed beans.LOL
LOL@ Mike! If we ever see Cliff sitting outside of the hut we will know why and what he ate the night before.LOL
Beans, beans The musical Fruit The more you Eat The more you Toot!
